00058 template<class tDriver>
00059 double
00060 XOxfordDriver<tDriver>::read(int arg) throw (XInterface::XInterfaceError &)
00061 {
00062     double x;
00063     this->interface()->queryf("R%d", arg);
00064     int ret = this->interface()->scanf("R%lf", &x);
00065     if(ret != 1) throw XInterface::XConvError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00066     return x;
00067 }
